chunks.text: API Documentation v2.1 API Documentation Version: 2.1 | Base URL: https://api.clearpath.io/v2 Authentication All API requests require authentication via Bearer token. Generate tokens in Settings → API. Include token in the Authorization header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_TOKEN Core Endpoints GET /projects - List all projects POST /projects - Create a project GET /projects/:id/tasks - List tasks in a project POST /tasks - Create a task PATCH /tasks/:id - Update a task DELETE /tasks/:id - Delete a task Example: Create a Task POST /tasks Content-Type: application/json { "title": "Fix login bug", "description": "Users cannot log in with SSO", "project_id": "proj_123", "assignee_id": "user_456", "priority": "high", "due_date": "2024-02-01" } Rate Limits Pro: 1000 requests/hour | Enterprise: 5000 requests/hour Rate limit info in response headers: X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining Webhooks Configure webhooks in Settings → Webhooks. Events: task.created, task.updated, task.deleted, project.created. Payload includes full object data. Retry logic: 3 attempts with exponential backoff.
